## How to use

To **enable** this rule in the CLI or using the config file, you can use:

::: code-group

```bash [CLI]
oxlint --deny nextjs/no-script-component-in-head --nextjs-plugin
```

```json [Config (.oxlintrc.json)]
{
  "plugins": ["nextjs"],
  "rules": {
    "nextjs/no-script-component-in-head": "error"
  }
}
```

:::
